paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant Asn372His, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: Patients with tobacco-related multiple primary neoplasms, primarily from North India.
patients.phenotype: Tobacco-related cancers, specifically in the upper aero digestive tract.

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 Asn372His SNP showed significant risk association for dominant model for at least one TRC in UADT category.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is located in a conserved region of the BRCA2 gene.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 Asn372His SNP showed significant risk association for dominant model for at least one TRC in UADT category.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was reported in the paper.
